ComicInfo.Summary: Parodies of the films 'Flipper,' 'Striptease' and 'The Hunchback of Notre Dame.'
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-06-12 15:27:38. [CVDB146260] Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-18 22:51:36. [Issue ID 250672]
ComicInfo.Characters: The Hunchback of Notre Dame,Marty Gilbert,Tweety Bird,Sylvester P. Smythe,Casper,Road Runner,Adolf Hitler,Jim Carrey,Arnold Schwarzenegger,Newt Gingrich,Bob Dole,Gort,Mufasa
ComicInfo.Title: The Olympic Commitee Would Like to Thank All of Our Official Sponsors.; How Well Do You Know the Summer Olympics?; Olympics Guide; The 10 Most Common Olympic Injuries; Cracked Animal Ailments; Job Changes Caused by Downsizing; The Unstable Guy; Lord of the Rings; Miranda Rights for Everyday Living; The Fanny; McPoop's Dilemma; Movie Merchandise That Never Quite Caught on!; Summer Movie Shut-Ups; Cliff's Other Notes; Great Moments in Aviation; In Depends Day
ComicInfo.Writer: Gary Fields,Mike Ricigliano,Greg Grabianski,Eric Goldberg,Mark Howard,Fred Sahner,Andy Simmons,Bob Weske,Ed Subitzky,Barry Dutter,Dan Birtcher,Judd Stomp,Lou Silverstone
ComicInfo.Penciller: Gary Fields,Mike Ricigliano,Rurik Tyler,Bruce Bolinger,Don Orehek,Frank Cummings,Pete Fitzgerald,Randy Jones,John Severin,Walter Brogan
ComicInfo.Inker: Gary Fields,Mike Ricigliano,Rurik Tyler,Bruce Bolinger,Don Orehek,Frank Cummings,Pete Fitzgerald,Randy Jones,John Severin,Walter Brogan
